Pinterest is a tool to find your inspiration and share it with others. Use it to collect things you love, organise and plan important projects, and much more. Features • Pin images from around the web • Explore Pins and boards you’re interested in • Get inspiration from DIY, Travel, Food and other categories • Pin with your camera Why do we require a particular permission? https://help.pinterest.com/entries/21865478#permissions Photos in screenshots licensed under Creative Commons: http://passets-cdn.pinterest.com/android-attribution.txt
"-Get push notifications to know when someone comments, likes or repins your stuff -Search… and you shall receive suggestions -Mention your friends in comments"
-Tap Edit Home Feed to easily add and remove stuff from your home feed -Find out when you’ve already pinned something
- Invite friends to Pinterest by text or email - Invite, accept or block people from your group boards
- Articles pins will include the headline, author, story description and link - Create a Pin from your favourite browser or app
• Pin around the world: now available in more languages • New context menu lets you Pin, like and share more quickly

"It looks as though you don't have any boards yet! You can save your Pins into collections called boards. Boards make your Pins easy to find later for you and your followers. Create your first board now!"
"Thanks for asking! We'll let you know when there's an answer."
Secret boards are only visible on your profile
"Deactivating means that no one will see your Pins or anything else in your Pinterest profile. You also won't be linked to %1$s. You can come back at any time."
Deactivating means no one will see your Pins or anything else in your Pinterest profile, but other Pinners will still be able to see any messages you sent to them. You can come back at any time.
"I'll be back. I'm just taking a break!"

If you disconnect Facebook, you will not be able to log in with Facebook. To log in to Pinterest, you will have to use your email on file and your current password.
If you disconnect Google, you will not be able to log in with Google. To log in to Pinterest, you will have to use your email and password.
If you disconnect Rakuten, you will not be able to log in with Rakuten. To log in to Pinterest, you will have to use your email on file and your current password.
If you disconnect Twitter, you will not be able to log in with Twitter. To log in to Pinterest, you will have to use your email on file and your current password.
Discover ideas for all of your projects and interests
